ai-mil3.2.8:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, what is it that I call a giant bull elephant?”
ai-mil3.2.8:1.3_0: “Great king, whatever form there are gross, the mind-made, and the things that are subtle.”
ai-mil3.2.8:1.4_0: “Venerable Sir, what reason do you believe in?”
ai-mil3.2.8:1.5_0: “Great king, these things are very vital condition, when they arise.”
ai-mil3.2.8:2.2_0: “Great king, if you were to have no chickens or pigs, then all the necks on the side of the Kakkaṭa,
ai-mil3.2.8:2.3_0: In the same way, there are those names for form, there is no continued existence in both ways: both of these are not attached to continued existence.
ai-mil3.2.8:2.4_0: That’s how it is for a long time.”
ai-mil3.2.8:4.1_0: The eighth enquiry is the eighth section.
